page.title: 16ROBIN TANNER (continued)
page.content: AS AN H.M.I.WHERE HE THOUGHT IT WAS VERY DIRTY, BUT THE PEOPLE HE THOUGHT WERE VERY FRIENDLY . MR.TANNER USED THE TRAM, BUS AND TRAIN . HE CAME HOME TO WILTSHIRE ONCE A MONTH . THEN HE WAS TRANSFERRED TO THE{COTSWOLDS, {GLOUCESTERSHIRE}AND LATER FINISHED A M0ST{DISTINGUISHED CAREER}IN OXFORDSHIRE IN 1964, AND STARTED HIS ETCHING . AT THE MOMENT HE'S DONE NEARLY 40 HE'S DONE A SET OF MONTHS FROM{JANUARY TO DECEMBER .}HE HAS ILLUSTRATED A BOOK WRITTEN BY HIS WIFE CALLED{"WOODLAND PLANTS"}AND PRODUCED A BOOK CALLED{"WILTSHIRE VILLAGES" .
